entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
